definition: to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: Mendelian genetics in the setting of neuropsychiatry.
sentences.chinese: 神经精神医学中的孟德尔遗传学。

sentences.english: Charaka also knew the fundamentals of genetics.
sentences.chinese: 查拉卡也知道遗传学的基本原理。

sentences.english: Frankling, Eleanore. Practical Dog Breeding and Genetics .
A cytogenetic monitoring has been made on peasants who drank the contaminated well water long time.
sentences.chinese: 本文对该县饮用污染井水农民进行了细胞遗传学监测。

sentences.english: In cytogenetics, mosaicism is also sometimes referred to as mixoploidy .
sentences.chinese: 在细胞遗传学中，镶嵌性有时也称为混倍体。

sentences.english: Suresh: I'm a geneticist . I wouldn't know the first thing about this.
sentences.chinese: 我是个遗传学家，我对医疗这方面一窍不通。

sentences.english: The progress of the study on evolution and conservation genetics of Cervidae was reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 综述了近年来鹿科动物的进化和保护遗传学研究进展。

sentences.english: Preliminary analysis on genetics of phenotype measuration of plus tree of Ulmus pumita Linn.
sentences.chinese: 白榆优树表型测定的遗传学初步分析。

sentences.english: Many of the discoveries result from new techniques in molecular genetics.
sentences.chinese: 还有许多新发现是新兴分子遗传学技术发展的结果。

sentences.english: Optogenetics is an experimental method being used with great success in mice.
sentences.chinese: 光遗传学的小鼠试验非常成功。

sentences.english: Certainly a huge part of this is underlying genetics.
sentences.chinese: 当然，这里有很大一部分是属于遗传学的。

sentences.english: We can use genetics to stratify patients in clinical development.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以在临床开发中采用遗传学进行患者分层。

sentences.english: But there are also genetic grounds for the mongoose’s courage.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，猫鼬的勇气，还有遗传学的根据。

sentences.english: "It was taught by a fungal geneticist, " he says.
sentences.chinese: “教课的是一位凶猛的遗传学家”，他说。

sentences.english: This technique is called pre-implantation genetic diagnosis (PGD).
sentences.chinese: 这项技术被称为胚胎植入前遗传学诊断。

sentences.english: They were published in the journals Nature and Nature Genetics.
sentences.chinese: 这些发现出版在《自然与自然遗传学》杂志上。
